DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the effect on gait and activity of a home based physiotherapy intervention 4-6 months after the fracture. The investigators hypothesis is that exercises performed after the initial rehabilitation, which focuses on specific components of gait control will improve gait and increase level of activity.
DOC.brief_title: Eva-Hip, Evaluation of Rehabilitation After Hip-fracture
DOC.criteria: Home dwelling prior to fracture age>70yr able to walk 10m expected life expectancies <3 months exercises contraindicated due to medical conditions
